extendedInfo.description: Calltrunk increases the value of your calls by allowing you to save, search and share all of your phone conversations.â¢Record your calls, search their audio and text content, and listen to your calls directly from your Android phoneâ¢Â Calls are saved securely and accessible online through the Calltrunk websiteÂ â¢Sync your recorded conversations with Evernote, Dropbox or BoxCalltrunk is a totally new approach to call recording. Hereâs why: 1.Calltrunk is based onÂ the individual rather than the device. One account enables call recording across all your phonesÂ (including Skype).2.When you sign up you create an account that you can access through your regular web browser or your Android. No matter whether you make recordings on your landline, Skype or Android they all get securely stored in a single online account. 3.This means recordings are not tied to your Android and itâs easy to download recordings, make notes, order transcriptions and sync recordings with other services such as Evernote, Dropbox, SugarCRM or Box. 4.Calltrunk is FREE TO TRY. When you sign up to Calltrunk for the first time we offer you 90 minutes of call recording for free. Thatâs 30 minutes on your mobile or landline and 60 minutes of Skype recording. 5.No need to provide a credit card to sign up. Your secure account will be set up with just an email address and a password. 6.AFTER THE FREE TRIAL, if you decide you want to carry on using Calltrunk we offer monthly plans and a pay as you go model. 7.The monthly plans start at $4.99 per month and go all the way up to an unlimited plan at $49.99 which allows you to record unlimited calls on your landline, your mobile and Skype. 8.Pay as you go is 8c per minute. ARGOsearch âSEARCHABALE CONVERSATIONSâ brings call recording to a new level. ARGOsearch is currently included in regular service charges to use on all mobile, landline and Skype recordings made by our customers in the UK, US and Australia.  WHATâS ON THE APP â¢Dial any number to make a recorded phone call.*â¢Access all your recordings â even recordings you made from other phones or Skype. â¢ARGOsearch your phone calls for the words spoken.â¢On Demand button lets you use your Android as a Dictaphone. Or record inbound calls. Just request a call-back via the On Demand button in the keypad and then merge the calls to record!(this feature requires 3-way calling and call waiting to be enabled by your network provider)â¢Send recordings to external storage Evernote, Dropbox, Box.â¢App is integrated with your device contacts book.â¢Direct Support button* Emergency calls NOT supported

reviews.title: I can\'t login
reviews.comment: I try to login but is impossible, this app is a too big difference between the website. I can\'t believe this guys make a great web service and they can\'t be a simple app.
reviews.author: Alejandro Gallardo

reviews.title: Works for me
reviews.comment: I am a reporter and this app has been awesome. I am sorry others have had problems with it but I sure haven\'t. It\'s done what advertised for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot log in
reviews.comment: I have set up an account, but it does not allow me to log in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No reviews allowed to be posted or some blocked. No calls dialed within US no matter what I try. No phone or chat support even for Premim users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app - good quality recording
reviews.comment: Works well on my galaxy S. Useful as well. I tried a different app but the quality was so poor I ciunldn\'t hear the other person. Call trunk recordings are crystal clear.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The service is useful.  This app isn\'t.
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t give access to existing recordings.  Uninstalled.  LG Spectrum with Android 2.3.6.
reviews.author: A Google User
